import React from "react"; const dummyRefunds = [ { ticketNumber: "T123", reason: "Customer returned", timestamp: new Date() }, { ticketNumber: "T124", reason: "Damaged item", timestamp: new Date() }, ]; const dummyCashCounts = [ { totalAmount: 376, timestamp: new Date(), bills: { 100: 2, 50: 1, 20: 3, 10: 0, 5: 1, 1: 1 }, coins: { 1: 3, 0.5: 2, 0.25: 4, 0.1: 5, 0.05: 10, 0.01: 4 }, }, ]; const formatTime = (timestamp) => { const date = new Date(timestamp); const datePart = date.toLocaleDateString(undefined, { month: "2-digit", day: "2-digit", }); const timePart = date.toLocaleTimeString(undefined, { hour: "2-digit", minute: "2-digit", }); return `${datePart} ${timePart}`; }; export default function ClosingSummary() { return (

Refund Summary

{dummyRefunds.map((item, index) => ( ))}
Ticket Reason Timestamp
{item.ticketNumber} {item.reason} {formatTime(item.timestamp)}

Cash Count

{dummyCashCounts.map((item, index) => ( ))}
Timestamp Total Bills Coins
${item.totalAmount} {formatTime(item.timestamp)} {Object.keys(item.bills).map((key) => ( ))} {Object.values(item.bills).map((value, i) => ( ))}
{key}$
{value}
{Object.keys(item.coins).map((key) => ( ))} {Object.values(item.coins).map((value, i) => ( ))}
{key}$
{value}
); }
